fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport
eu_initiatives:
- Package Travel Directive 
- Passenger Rights (all modes) 
- Data Protection  
- PNR 
- VAT/TOMs 
- Tourism Accommodation Safety 
- Gastric Illness  
- Exiting the EU 
 
ABTA also takes an active interest in a number of other Internal Market, Transport and tax issues.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ABTA is a Member of ECTAA, the European Travel Agents' and Tour Operators' Associations
goals__remit: ABTA represents around 1,200 UK travel companies in 4,500 locations across the United Kingdom. Our Members range from small, specialist tour operators and independent travel agencies specialising in business travel, through to publicly listed companies and household names. Our key focus is ensuring that our Members’ voice is heard in Westminster and in Brussels and that our Members are able to continue to operate in a successful and sustainable manner.
